scripts.postinstall: devextreme build-theme --base-theme='material.orange.light' --output-color-scheme='base' --assetsBasePath='../../../node_modules/devextreme/dist/css/' --base --output-file src/themes/generated/theme.base.css && devextreme build-theme --base-theme='material.orange.dark' --output-color-scheme='additional' --assetsBasePath='../../../node_modules/devextreme/dist/css/' --base --make-swatch --output-file src/themes/generated/theme.additional.css && devextreme export-theme-vars --base-theme='material.orange.light' --output-file src/themes/generated/variables.base.scss && devextreme export-theme-vars --base-theme='material.orange.dark' --output-file src/themes/generated/variables.additional.scss
